Initializer# init(_:order:)

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
init<Value>(
    _ keyPath: any KeyPath<Compared, Value?> & Sendable,
    order: SortOrder = .forward
) where Value : Comparable
```
